titleStmt.title: A brief cronology of Great Britain from the first discoveries of this isle, through the severall comquests of the Romans, Saxons, Danes, and Normans.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.C. and are to be sold by T. Crosse,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication supplied by Wing.
With an engraving representing types of the various invaders of Britain.--Thomason catalogue.
Thomason copy imperfect; bottom of page cropped with loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
